segments.text: I see the bright sunlight streaming through the window, illuminating the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks peaceful and tidy, contrasting sharply with the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman diligently drying a plate, completely immersed in her task, and it somehow makes me feel warm inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I see the water pooling around her feet, and my heart sinks as I realize how much she’s missing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but envy her ability to focus on something so simple and mundane while the world falls apart around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are busy plotting their cookie theft, and I can feel my stomach churn at the thought of what could go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a funny scene—so full of life and yet filled with risk.
segments.speaker: PAR
